===Etymology===
{{Han simp|辭|f=𤔔|t=舌}}; {{Han simp|辤|f=受|t=舌}}. First ([[辭]]) is in sense of “words”, second ([[辤]]) is in sense of “quit”.

In current form, {{Han compound|舌|辛}}.
